page.title: 12Stanhope Show
page.content: Stanhope Show is a hundred and forty five years old,the first show being held in 1840.Stanhope Show is now held at the Show Field ,which is to be found on the other side of the village. It used to be held at the Castle Park but now this land is privately owned.It is held on the second weekend in September on the Saturday, Sunday, and Monday.Twelve to fifteen thousand people attend the show each year. There are many attractions for visitors to the Show.There are tents to view in which can be seen cakes art and crafts vegtables and lots of other home produce. There are also out side attractions which rely on good weather.There is a band playing,farm animals on show and activties in the ring,such as show-jumping.
